definition: to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Vindictive little men and women squabble, with a different kind of relationship.
sentences.chinese: 小男女鬥嘴鬥氣，有了一種別樣的關係。

sentences.english: You can use Limit Breaks more frequently under Aura.
sentences.chinese: 在鬥氣狀態下可以經常使用極限技。

sentences.english: I absolutely understand your feeling. Because it's inevitable to quarrel with your best friend.
sentences.chinese: 跟好友鬧彆扭，常比與情人鬥氣，更來得火大。

sentences.english: Dragon is a pure call of the mainland of the world, no magic without vindictiveness.
sentences.chinese: 龍騰大陸是個純召喚的世界，無魔法無鬥氣。

sentences.english: But I recently dropped the grudge.
Yes. Aura's purpose to increase the chance of receiving a Limit Break.
sentences.chinese: 鬥氣的作用是提升極限技出現的機率。

sentences.english: Two neighbors had been fighting each other for nigh on four decades.
sentences.chinese: 兩個鄰居夜以繼日地鬥氣，鬥了有40年。

sentences.english: The two began to grudge and do not compromise.
sentences.chinese: 兩個就開始互不妥協的鬥氣。

definition: lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
lit. two segments with a single cut (idiom)/fig. to make a clean break (idiom)
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to fall out with sb/to become hostile
to question intensely/to interrogate/to demand information
to have an acrimonious falling-out/to shed all pretense of cordiality/to tear into each other
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
